creator: Soubhagya Chatterjee
newsArray.description: India have one match left against Sri Lanka, which is inconsequential given Sri Lanka have zero wins beside their name. The two teams who can reach a maximum of two wins are Bangladesh and Pakistan and they will play each other. A win for either will guarantee them a place in the final of the Asia Cup 2025 against India. It is now a virtual semifinal.
